dialogue.line: Good morning sleepyhead! Well, hopefully you won't oversleep our arrival on %%GDCeres%% ;-)
Mum and dad sent me a message. %%RDDads job was cut%%, but he looks for new opportunities.
At least now he doesn't have to lift as hard as in that shitty job. They told me we shouldn't worry.
Anyway, I got this parcel stamp before we left earth, wanna have it? Just ask my %%GRintroverted%% me friendly.
Haha nice, here you have the little treasure!
Hmm ok... anyway...
Haha, lets try this again. I have some %%GRCornuts%% if you like.
I quiet "please" for my %%GRintroverted%% self is enough.. you know I am a sensitive, %%GRfeeling%% person..
Enjoy :-)
I think you should know me better..
Haha, enough gifts for you today, time work I guess.
If you %%RDforget how to address%% me right, %%RDcheck out the INFO%% in upper right corner.
Seems the the %%VTsupervisor%% has work for you, thats a good opportunity to get some money.
Look outside, our future is near.
You can already see %%VTCeres%%.. we are light-years away from home. Can you imagine?
I was always curious about your motivations.. %%GRwhy are you here?%%
Ahh, I understand.. many people come here for the money. %%VTCereX%% pays their technician well.
Thats the best place for that sake, on %%VTCereX%% nobody knows you.
How philosophic haha. Your are right, what %%VTCereX%% build up here changes the world.
You will find it for sure, there is much to discover. %%VTCereX%% paid billions to dig up the marvels of this place.
For my part tough.. I am a doctor, I want to %%GRhelp people%%. On earth its feels difficult to make a difference, but here I can change things.
%%RDSomething hit the ship!%%
Hurry! Go to the %%RDtrader%%, we have to act quickly!
Hurry! Go to the %%RDtrader%%!
I am glad the meteor just hit some freight. It could be worse..
%%GRJulius is too proud%% to admit it, but everybody is happy that you were able to restore the energy. You should %%VTrest a little now%%.
Hey?! I just wanted to look after you while you are on the night shift.. Shouldn't you be in the control room?
Or is something wrong with the %%VTrescue pods%%?

dialogue.option: >We have a blind passenger.. to be precise a lot of..<

dialogue.line: Tell me what happened..
Thats a crazy story. And now you want to %%VTsend them off board%% by a rescue pod?

dialogue.option: >At least some of them, otherwise they die<

dialogue.line: You cannot launch the rescue pods without %%RDactivating the alarm%%, and this would wake up the CereX guys.
But the console could be overridden by some of my %%GRsmall friends%%..
Take this %%GRGeobacter Electra%% culture and let them grow in the incubator of the %%VTlife support room%%.
Take this %%GRGeobacter Electra%% culture and let them grow in the incubator of the %%VTlife support room%%.
Go to the %%VTlife support room%% and use the incubator to grow %%GRGeobacter Electra%%.
With the %%GRbacteria%% you can overload the %%VTrescue pods%% console.
